import ast

files = [
    'main.py',
    'transcriber/buffer.py',
    'transcriber/audio_capture.py',
    'transcriber/transcription.py',
    'ui/app.py',
]
all_ok = True

        print\('  OK ', f\)

        print\('  ERR', f, str\(e\)\)
